title: Vega C to launch Brazilian satellite
key_assets: ['Amazonia-1B satellite launch on Vega C rocket']
summary: Brazil’s National Institute for Space Research (INPE) has contracted SpaceLaunch, a Texas-based launch broker, to launch the Amazonia-1B Earth observation satellite on a Vega C rocket in 2027. The contract is valued at $35.6 million. SpaceLaunch has an existing agreement with Avio for this launch, though INPE did not contract directly with Avio.
why_it_matters: This contract highlights Avio’s growing role in marketing and managing Vega C launches, following the transition of launch services duties from Arianespace. It also underscores the use of launch brokers in securing institutional customers for European launch providers.

entities.name: SpaceLaunch
entities.involvement: direct (contracted by INPE, partner of Avio)
